metadata.title: CVE-2020-9925 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue isfixed in iOS 13.6 and iPadOS 13.6, tvOS 13.4.8, watchOS 6.2.8, Safari13.1.2, iTunes 12.10.8 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 11.3, iCloud forWindows 7.20. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead touniversal cross site scripting.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
